name: Holiday Mosaics Christmas Puzzles
description:
Explore 6 locations and unlock 120 mosaics in Holiday Mosaics: Christmas Puzzles. All the puzzles are made from breathtaking photos. Dive into an atmosphere of holiday cheer and get new ideas for celebrating!

The mosaics are split into pieces of various shapes and sizes. Each new puzzle differs from the last – the pieces are generated at random.
Assemble puzzles on a time limit, earn keys and unlock new locations. Increasing difficulty and several different types of levels await you. Speed mosaics – hurry and assemble the picture as fast as you can. Logical mosaics – puzzles with a high number of pieces and a time limit for assembly. Simple mosaics – light exercise to warm up for the harder puzzles. And finally, the true challenge – hardcore puzzles with a multitude of missing pieces and a time limit.

Bored of fighting the clock? Want to just relax and assemble mosaics? Switch on Timeless Mode in the settings.

Feel the Christmas spirit in Holiday Mosaics: Christmas Puzzles!

- 120 breathtaking photo mosaics
- Bored of fighting against the clock? Turn on Timeless Mode
- 120 exciting ideas for the holiday – make your Christmas more fun!
- Special quests and 18 trophies for the real pros
- More than 10 hours of gameplay with beautiful calming and cheerful music
- Entertaining gameplay for players of all ages
- Use bonuses and earn new ranks
